TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed Environment/SpecialFolder extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定用來擷取系統特殊資料夾目錄路徑的列舉常數。

span.span: Specifies enumerated constants used to retrieve directory paths to system special folders.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系統特殊資料夾是資料夾例如**Program Files**，**程式**，**系統**，或**啟動**，其中包含一般資訊。The system special folders are folders such as **Program Files**, **Programs**, **System**, or **Startup**, which contain common information. 特殊資料夾依預設會設定系統，或由使用者明確安裝的 Windows 版本時。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. 方法會傳回這個列舉型別相關聯的位置。The method returns the locations associated with this enumeration. 這些資料夾的位置可以在不同作業系統上有不同的值、 使用者可以變更某些位置，和位置會當地語系化。The locations of these folders can have different values on different operating systems, the user can change some of the locations, and the locations are localized. 如需特殊資料夾的詳細資訊，請參閱[KNOWNFOLDERID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd378457.aspx) Windows 文件中的常數。For more information about special folders, see the [KNOWNFOLDERID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd378457.aspx) constants in the Windows documentation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用與方法來取得系統目錄。The following example shows how to use with the method to get the System directory. [!code-cpp[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/CPP/getfolderpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/CS/getfolderpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/VB/getfolderpath.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder AdminTools = int32(48)

summary.span: 檔案系統目錄，用於儲存個別使用者的系統管理工具。

span.span: The file system directory that is used to store administrative tools for an individual user.

summary.span: Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 會將自訂的主控台儲存至這個目錄，而這個目錄會隨著使用者一起漫遊。

span.span: The Microsoft Management Console (MMC) will save customized consoles to this directory, and it will roam with the user.

summary.span: 已在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 中加入。

span.span: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder ApplicationData = int32(26)

summary.span: 表示做為目前漫遊使用者的應用程式特定資料之通用儲存機制的目錄。

span.span: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data for the current roaming user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 漫遊使用者適用於在網路上的多部電腦。A roaming user works on more than one computer on a network. 為漫遊使用者設定檔會保留在網路上的伺服器上，並且在使用者登入載入系統。A roaming user's profile is kept on a server on the network and is loaded onto a system when the user logs on.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CDBurning = int32(59)

summary.span: 檔案系統目錄，做為等候寫入 CD 之檔案的暫存區域。

span.span: The file system directory that acts as a staging area for files waiting to be written to a CD.

summary.span: 已在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 中加入。

span.span: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonAdminTools = int32(47)

summary.span: 檔案系統目錄，包含電腦之所有使用者的系統管理工具。

span.span: The file system directory that contains administrative tools for all users of the computer.

span.span: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonApplicationData = int32(35)

summary.span: 表示做為所有使用者使用的應用程式特定資料之通用儲存機制的目錄。

span.span: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data that is used by all users.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonDesktopDirectory = int32(25)

summary.span: 檔案系統目錄，包含在所有使用者的桌面上出現的檔案和資料夾。

span.span: The file system directory that contains files and folders that appear on the desktop for all users.

summary.span: 這個特殊資料夾僅適用於 Windows NT 系統。

span.span: This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems.

span.span: The file system directory that contains documents that are common to all users.

span.span: The directory used to physically store file objects on the desktop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿混淆這個目錄的 [桌面] 資料夾本身，也就是虛擬資料夾。Do not confuse this directory with the desktop folder itself, which is a virtual folder.

summary.span: [我的電腦] 資料夾。

span.span: The **My Computer** folder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks MyComputer 常數永遠會產生空字串 ("") 因為沒有路徑定義為 [我的電腦] 資料夾。The MyComputer constant always yields the empty string ("") because no path is defined for the My Computer folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder MyDocuments = int32(5)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是相當於個人。This member is equivalent to Personal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系統會啟動這些程式，每當使用者登入，或啟動 Windows NT 或更新版本，或啟動 Windows 98。The system starts these programs whenever a user logs on or starts Windows NT or later, or starts Windows 98.

summary.span: 應用程式不應該在這個層級建立檔案或資料夾，而應該將其資料放在 所參考的位置下。

span.span: Applications should not create files or folders at this level; they should put their data under the locations referred to by .
